snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order #Frostpunk 2 Deluxe Edition and start playing Advanced Access now: http://re.11bits.com/mls

We're thrilled to welcome the first players back to the harsh, frozen world of New London with the launch of Advanced Access. As Stewards, you will face hardships, tough decisions, and ideological conflicts. When the sirens pierce the cold air with their chilling wail, it signals one thing: you’ve failed your people, Steward. #TheCityMustNotFall
